ISSUE.TITLE: Automatically cleanup installed app when you stop using the device
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi guys: I met a problem when I use stop using selected device: 1. I selected one ZTE device. 2. Install an app. 3. Stop using and reuse it. 4. I found the installed app cleaned up by stf device plugins. Other devices like XiaoMi, Huawei, Nexus don't have this problem Please give some guidance. Thanks Luis
